# Monitor the Situations

> Real-time global situation monitoring dashboard - A free, live ops-center style dashboard for tracking world events.

## What is Monitor the Situations?

Monitor the Situations is a web-based dashboard that provides real-time monitoring of global events in an ops-center aesthetic. It aggregates multiple data sources into a single, easy-to-use interface designed for situational awareness.

## Features

- **Flight Radar**: Live military and civilian aircraft tracking via ADS-B Exchange. Monitor flight paths, military movements, and aviation activity worldwide.
- **Stock Markets**: Real-time stock market data including major indices (S&P 500, Dow Jones, NASDAQ), defense stocks (Lockheed Martin, Raytheon, Northrop Grumman), and cryptocurrency prices.
- **Breaking News**: Live news ticker aggregating headlines from BBC News, The Guardian, and NPR for real-time news monitoring.
- **Intel Sources**: Curated collection of OSINT (Open Source Intelligence) Twitter/X accounts covering geopolitics, military movements, and breaking global events.

## Use Cases

- Real-time situational awareness during breaking news events
- OSINT monitoring and intelligence gathering
- Market tracking during global events and geopolitical developments
- Flight tracking for aviation enthusiasts and news monitoring
- All-in-one dashboard for staying informed on world events

## Technical Details

- **URL**: https://monitorthesituations.com
- **Type**: Free web application (no account required)
- **Access**: Open to all users, no registration needed
- **Updates**: Real-time data with automatic refresh
- **Platform**: Works on desktop and mobile browsers
